title: Critical Thinking-Enhanced Program for Strengthening Information Literacy and Research Readiness

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Small-scale intensive workshop emphasizing integrated application of information management, critical analysis, and metacognitive strategies to cultivate research competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can present three or more criteria for evaluating credible information sources when designing research to solve real-world social issues
Learners can apply bias identification and critical analysis skills during information gathering to produce research outcome reports
Learners can develop a metacognitive journaling framework to reflectively document the research process

resources: PBL Practice Casebook on Social Issues

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
